definition: to (a place)/until (a time)/up to/to go/to arrive/(verb complement denoting completion or result of an action)
to visit/to call on/to seek/to inquire/to investigate

sentences.english: The past is a good place to visit, but certainly not a good place to stay.
sentences.chinese: 過去，是我們偶爾到訪的好去處，但顯然不宜長留。

sentences.english: Even if your friend should visit, you should still not kill.
sentences.chinese: 4點不能殺雞，即使你朋友到訪也不行。

sentences.english: News of the Queen's visit set the whole town astir .
sentences.chinese: 女王到訪的消息轟動全城。

sentences.english: Republicans have been uncertain how to respond to the visit.
sentences.chinese: 共和黨人仍不知道該如何迴應她的到訪。

sentences.english: He followed up with a visit to Iran the following year and then befriended Chávez.
sentences.chinese: 翌年，他又到訪伊朗，之後結識了查韋斯。

sentences.english: A week earlier he was also in North Korea with a parliamentary delegation.
sentences.chinese: 此前一週，他還隨中國人大代表團到訪朝鮮。

sentences.english: SHONEN JUMP: What parts of the world have you visited?
sentences.chinese: 您到訪過世界的哪些地方？

sentences.english: Criticism of the papal visit has come mainly from the "Los Indignados" (Indignant Ones) protest movement.
sentences.chinese: 對教皇到訪的批評主要來自所謂的憤怒者運動。

sentences.english: Even if your friend should visit, you should still not kill. It is highly forbidden.
sentences.chinese: 4點不能殺雞，即使你朋友到訪也不行。

sentences.english: Mr. & Mrs. Jy-Guang Shih were accompanied by their son Eric to visit the farm.
sentences.chinese: 史之光夫婦由兒子史晟炫先生陪同到訪。

sentences.english: He's especially happy that some of those visitors come from abroad.
sentences.chinese: 尤爲令他高興的是，有些到訪者來自國外。

sentences.english: A tour to Sany Heavy Industry Company Limited.
sentences.chinese: 到訪三一重工集團有限公司。

sentences.english: But almost all of them visit in summer.
sentences.chinese: 絕大多數的遊客喜歡在夏天到訪。

sentences.english: Check to see if you require visas for the country or countries you are visiting or transiting.
sentences.chinese: 查詢您是否需要獲得到訪或過境的國家的簽證。

sentences.english: One lesson learnt, and since then, JAF always make a "reservation" for this dish before going to the restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 那次以後，找食趣到訪前都一定會先打電話預訂了。

definition: to pay a visit/to call on
to seek by inquiry or search/to call on/to visit
to visit/to call on/to seek/to inquire/to investigate
